name: Maia
headline: AI relationship app that keeps couples together
description: Maia helps couples connect more each day. Trained by relationship experts, Maia offers daily activities, personalized advice, proactive insights, quizzes and games through AI and relationship science.

founders.name: Claire Wiley, Founder
founders.description: Building Maia to help couples stay together. Immigrant raised in multi-cultural households. Launched a couples coaching program during MBA. Previously in tech/infra private equity. Pro: love & therapy. Anti: fixed mindsets.

raw_markdown='##### Join the waitlist!
We're building an **advice column** app, "Dear Maia," where you can write letters to experts. Whether you're seeking relationship or dating advice, our experts can provide personalized, thoughtful responses. Sign up to be among the first to experience "Dear Maia" when we launch!

# Stay together using AI
Download MAIA to hea_
[![download on the app store](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f0d8f33fe7e1e74dd81a9/665f1d069911000abc43b35e_App%20Store.svg)](https://www.ourmaia.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/maia-relationship-couples/id6462700876?pt=101220804&ct=website&mt=8>)[![get it on the google play](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f0d8f33fe7e1e74dd81a9/665f1d06df6db560519d85a6_Google%20Play.svg)](https://www.ourmaia.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.maia.MaiaApp&utm_source=website&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=na&pli=1>)
## How Maia works
![maia app](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f0d8f33fe7e1e74dd81a9/665f221a2b974bffb8431bcc_card-01.webp)
Chat using Voice & Text
Start conversations with Maia via text or voice, anytime you need. Whether it's daily check-ins or deep discussions, Maia's here to spice things up and keep things light.
![maia app](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f0d8f33fe7e1e74dd81a9/665f221a9b79e5f0ab80845e_card-02.webp)
AI-Driven Insights
Get 24/7 available advice and suggestions based on your conversations. From resolving fights to planning your next big adventure, Maia is made for the two of you.
![maia app](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f0d8f33fe7e1e74dd81a9/665f221af27df40262d474d8_card-03.webp)
Grow & Learn
As your relationship evolves, so does Maia. The more you two interact in the app, the better Maia's suggestions get to strengthen your bond and keep the fun alive!
## Trusted by couples everywhere
See how Maia has empowered couples to grow closer and stronger together.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Maia**

Founded in 2023 and part of the Y Combinator Batch W24, Maia is an innovative startup based in San Francisco. Its mission? To create an AI relationship app that helps couples stay connected and nurture their relationships every day. With just a small team of two employees, Maia is already making waves in the relationship advice space.

**How It Works**

Maia utilizes insights from relationship experts to offer a suite of features geared towards enhancing communication and engagement among couples. Users can expect daily activities, personalized advice, quizzes, games, and proactive insights. The app allows for voice and text communication, enabling couples to easily engage whether they want to check in or tackle deeper discussions. 

As the relationship evolves, so does Maia’s understanding of the couple, delivering increasingly tailored advice. The AI-driven insights are available 24/7, helping couples navigate everything from everyday bumps to planning big adventures together.

**Upcoming Features**

Currently, Maia is building an advice column app titled "Dear Maia," where users can submit their relationship queries to receive personalized responses from experts. This reflects their commitment to being a comprehensive support system for couples seeking guidance and connection.

**User Engagement**

Early adopters are already raving about the app's capabilities, emphasizing how it has empowered them to rekindle excitement in their relationships. Users have expressed that Maia can even facilitate difficult conversations, adding a unique layer of support to their interactions. 

**Get Involved**

For those interested in improving their relationships with the help of technology, Maia encourages users to join their waitlist and upcoming features. You can check out their website at [ourmaia.com](https://www.ourmaia.com) to learn more and download the app.

In summary, Maia is not just another relationship app—it's a proactive partner in your relationship journey, blending AI with relationship science to foster deeper connections. Whether you're navigating the ups and downs of love or simply trying to keep the spark alive, Maia aims to elevate your experience seamlessly.
